body_html:
Another idea I've tried is based on this stackoverflow answer where the OP suggests using tf.placeholder_with_default and set its default input as the output from the FIFO queue.

As a result I've tried something like this:

...
input_from_filename_queue = image_reader.read(filename_queue)
input = tf.placeholder_with_default(input=input_from_filename_queue, shape=(2, ))
...
h = sess.partial_run_setup(fetches=[file_name, image], feeds=input)
file_name_tensor = sess.partial_run(handle=h, fetches=file_name, feed_dict=None)
image_tensor = sess.partial_run(handle=h, fetches=image, feed_dict=None)
...

I've tried different variations of things to feed into the feed_dict in the above snippet but they all failed. I'm wondering whether this approach could be modified into a working solution.

PS: I'm not exactly sure whether this fits into a new feature request. I've tried asking the same question on stackoverflow without receiving any answer so I want to try and see if this question fits here.

body:
Another idea I've tried is based on this [stackoverflow answer](stackoverflow.com/a/37584169) where the OP suggests using `tf.placeholder_with_default` and set its default input as the output from the FIFO queue.

As a result I've tried something like this:

    ...
    input_from_filename_queue = image_reader.read(filename_queue)
    input = tf.placeholder_with_default(input=input_from_filename_queue, shape=(2, ))
    ...
    h = sess.partial_run_setup(fetches=[file_name, image], feeds=input)
    file_name_tensor = sess.partial_run(handle=h, fetches=file_name, feed_dict=None)
    image_tensor = sess.partial_run(handle=h, fetches=image, feed_dict=None)
    ...

I've tried different variations of things to feed into the `feed_dict` in the above snippet but they all failed. I'm wondering whether this approach could be modified into a working solution.

PS: I'm not exactly sure whether this fits into a *new feature request*. I've tried asking the same question on [stackoverflow](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/42757785/how-should-i-output-partial-information-in-tensorflow-when-exceptions-are-thrown) without receiving any answer so I want to try and see if this question fits here.
